Without the arrangement, I would have used {'B': 4, 'G': 1} and ended up with {'B': 9, 'G': 1, 'R': 0}. The score without the trade would be 20 (for reaching the goal) + 5*(9+1) = 70. With the trade, my score would be 20 + 5*(5+1) = 50. Thus, accepting this arrangement results in a lower score. Hence, I should reject this arrangement.
